import {CurrencyIcon, Button, LockIcon, DeleteIcon, DragIcon} from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' import style from "./burger-constructor.module.css" function BurgerConstructor(props) { console.log(props.sendAddedIngridients) const totalPrice = (props.sendAddedIngridients).reduce((acc, p) => acc + p.price, 0) return(
    {props.sendAddedIngridients.map((arr) => (

  • {arr.name}

    {arr.price}

    • ))}

{totalPrice}

) } export default BurgerConstructor
